## Key Files

## Commit Convention
All commits must follow Conventional Commits format:
- `feat:` - New features
- `fix:` - Bug fixes
- `perf:` - Performance improvements
- `docs:` - Documentation
- `chore:` - Maintenance (hidden from release notes)

See: https://github.com/npenchev83/guesthouse-deploy/blob/main/DEPLOYMENT.md
